channel.title: Beware of Mopman
channel.description:
(if your a prostitute from ipswich) http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk/6171319.stm
[15:22] im off to get laid [15:22] lies [15:22] see youz [15:22] gl with that [15:23] lel [15:23] ill bring the window [15:23] come here doggy [15:23] thsoe women on the street cost, yknow [15:23] lol [15:23] rofl [15:23] * MrChris has quit IRC [15:23] if you can even find one :( none around here now [15:23] there free in ipswich [15:23] haha i live in ipswich :( [15:23] llolol [15:23] well right near [15:23] ha ha! mopman is the ipswich killer! [15:23] the one that was dumped in a brook was just down my road plz [15:23] but [15:23] i didnt mean to kill her [15:23] this is going on the friggin forums [15:23] i was just getting a bit violent and i went too far [15:24] we wont be seeing mopman tomorrow [15:24] i hope nobody here is from suffolk police dept. [15:24] haha [15:24] BUSTED [15:24] IM A COP

item.title: Beware of Mopman
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:13, topic:37131”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=52710.msg649657#msg649657 date=1166568038]

I live in England

Join the club.

Lol, you people are lucky :P. You dont have an 8 hour plane flight to get there :(.

I’m freezing my ass off, how is that lucky? >.>
[/quote]

I second that.[/quote]

Thirdy wirdy that!

This morning on the wayto the bus stop my balls were beign pulled down by the icicles hanging off them and the fog was so thick that i couldnt see the end of my penis![br][size=1]Posted at: December 19, 2006, 05:11:21 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Hex Key, post:23, topic:37131”]Viva England!

Yes its cold, but its good for you and we dont ahve to put up with such a high concentration of yokel americans as the americans do :)[/quote]

We have to put up with the Pakistani invasion…
